sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PERSON ( person_id, virtual_account, name, nickname, balance, id_number, sex, birthday, local_calls, phone, email, skype, career, recipient, rec_add, rec_num, company_tax_id, updater, update_time ) VALUES ( #person_id#, #virtual_account#, #name#, #nickname#, #balance#, #id_number#, #sex#, #birthday#, #local_calls#, #phone#, #email#, #skype#, #career#, #recipient#, #rec_add#, #rec_num#, #company_tax_id#, #updater#, #update_time# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT person_id,virtual_account,name,nickname,balance,id_number,sex,birthday,local_calls,phone,email,skype,career,recipient,rec_add,rec_num,company_tax_id,updater,update_time FROM PERSON person_id = #person_id# virtual_account = #virtual_account# name = #name# nickname = #nickname# balance = #balance# id_number = #id_number# sex = #sex# birthday = #birthday# local_calls = #local_calls# phone = #phone# email = #email# skype = #skype# career = #career# recipient = #recipient# rec_add = #rec_add# rec_num = #rec_num# company_tax_id = #company_tax_id# updater = #updater# update_time = #update_time# ORDER BY $order$ $fromIndex$, $rowLimit$ $rowLimit$

SELECT person_id,virtual_account,name,nickname,balance,id_number,sex,birthday,local_calls,phone,email,skype,career,recipient,rec_add,rec_num,company_tax_id,updater,update_time FROM PERSON person_id LIKE #like_person_id# name LIKE #like_name# phone LIKE #like_phone# email LIKE #like_email# ORDER BY $order$ $fromIndex$, $rowLimit$ $rowLimit$

SELECT count(*) count FROM PERSON person_id = #person_id# virtual_account = #virtual_account# name = #name# nickname = #nickname# balance = #balance# id_number = #id_number# sex = #sex# birthday = #birthday# local_calls = #local_calls# phone = #phone# email = #email# skype = #skype# career = #career# recipient = #recipient# rec_add = #rec_add# rec_num = #rec_num# company_tax_id = #company_tax_id# updater = #updater# update_time = #update_time#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PERSON person_id = #person_id# virtual_account = #virtual_account# name = #name# nickname = #nickname# balance = #balance# id_number = #id_number# sex = #sex# birthday = #birthday# local_calls = #local_calls# phone = #phone# email = #email# skype = #skype# career = #career# recipient = #recipient# rec_add = #rec_add# rec_num = #rec_num# company_tax_id = #company_tax_id# updater = #updater# update_time = #update_time# WHERE person_id = #person_id#
